hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "There is a Sadaqa to be given for every joint of the human body; and for every day on which the sun rises there is a reward of a Sadaqa (i.e. charitable gift) for the one who establishes justice among people

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ الإِصْلاَحِ بَيْنَ النَّاسِ وَالْعَدْلِ بَيْنَهُمْ
chapter.eng-name: The superoirity of making peace and establishing justice among the people
